name: Taken Sky
description:
Warning: This is a "How the Sausage is Made" Demo.

Following the events of Episode Zero: Star Scope Solo, the space pirate Captain decided to get his ship, run by his trusty on-board AI named Erika, repaired and upgraded by the mysterious Old Man. Things do not go as planned. Because the Old Man screwed up. Badly.

Controls

The Old Man has unfortunately not yet implemented customizable controls. The Captain is stuck with these:

  • WASD: Movement
  • Left Mouse: Shoot Primary Weapon/Next Dialogue
  • Right Mouse: Shoot Secondary Weapon/Skip Dialogue

The Old Man's Screw-up

  • Erika was taken apart and put back together in the Old Man's misguided attempt to overhaul and improve everything about her. A lot of her old functionalities have been broken as a result.
    • Erika's jukebox is broken. She doesn't have her old sound effects and music playing abilities.
    • Erika only has two weapon modules installed. But at least you can fire both without switching modules.
    • Erika currently cannot be upgraded
  • It would be irresponsible to let you go out space pirating with your ship in this condition. You are currently not allowed to leave the test flight area.
  • Seriously, I screwed up. Go play Episode Zero instead to actually have fun. This demo is only being released for my own vanity of making me feel like I'm making progress.
